content: 随笔6.17随写 大梦如幻，夜度桃花界三千，醒时浮屠一场空。 若云与梦同幻，及草地而坠，拥风而落席。 花草低语，鸟涧从鸣，不知高阳忽坠，不识月黯徐来。 冯明而毗落，月影故归息。 伏兮随风起，万物从梦生。 故有梦而幻，有幻而空坠，空坠故不言、不语、不假、不真。 见岁时稍转，逢天地之不界。 故醒而一枕黄粱，若有即若无。

title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start - 吴衍树Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server - 111111$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
